00035 template <typename T, const unsigned int D>
00036 struct KDSearchData {
00037 
00038   const Vector<T, D> &p; 
00039   const Vector<T, D> *data; 
00040   unsigned int K; 
00041 
00042   T hyperrect_distance; 
00043   T farthest_distance; 
00044   bool ignore_null_distances;  
00045 
00047   struct AxisData {
00048     T p; 
00049     T nearest; 
00050   } axis[D]; 
00051 
00053   KDSearchData(const Vector<T, D> &p, const Vector<T, D> *data, unsigned int K, bool ignore_p_in_tree);
00054 };
00055 
00057 template <typename T, const unsigned int D>
00058 struct KDLeaf {
00059   unsigned int first_index; 
00060   unsigned int num_elements; 
00061 
00063   KDLeaf(unsigned int first_index, unsigned int num_elements) :
00064     first_index(first_index), num_elements(num_elements) {}
00065 
00067   KDLeaf(std::istream &input);
00068 
00070   template <typename C> void explore(KDSearchData<T, D> &data, C &candidates) const;
00071 
00073   template <typename C> void intersect(KDSearchData<T, D> &data, C &candidates) const;
00074   template <typename C> void intersect_ignoring_same(KDSearchData<T, D> &data, C &candidates) const;
00075 
00077   bool write_to_binary_stream(std::ostream &out);
00078 
00079 #ifdef KCHE_TREE_DEBUG
00080   template <typename Op>
00081   bool verify_op(const Vector<T, D> *data, float value, int axis, const Op &op) const;
00082 #endif
00083 };
00084 
00086 template <typename T, const unsigned int D>
00087 struct KDNode {
00088 
00089   union {
00090     KDNode<T, D> *left_branch; 
00091     KDLeaf<T, D> *left_leaf; 
00092   };
00093 
00094   union {
00095     KDNode<T, D> *right_branch; 
00096     KDLeaf<T, D> *right_leaf; 
00097   };
00098 
00099   T split_value; 
00100 
00101   // The leaf flags use the two uppermost bits of the axis index. Won't handle more than 2^30 dimensions.
00102   union {
00103     unsigned int axis; 
00104     unsigned int is_leaf; 
00105   };
00106 
00107   // Bit masks to access the leaf and axis information.
00108   static const unsigned int left_bit  = 0x80000000U; 
00109   static const unsigned int right_bit = 0x40000000U; 
00110   static const unsigned int axis_mask = 0x3FFFFFFFU; 
00111 
00112   // Constructors and destructor.
00113   KDNode() : left_branch(NULL), right_branch(NULL), is_leaf(0) {} 
00114   KDNode(std::istream &input); 
00115   ~KDNode(); 
00116 
00117 #ifdef KCHE_TREE_DEBUG
00118   bool verify(const Vector<T, D> *data, int axis) const;
00119 
00120   template <typename Op>
00121   bool verify_op(const Vector<T, D> *data, float value, int axis, const Op &op) const;
00122 #endif
00123 
00125   struct AxisComparer {
00126     const Vector<T, D> *data; 
00127     unsigned int axis; 
00128 
00130     bool operator () (const unsigned int &i1, const unsigned int &i2) const {
00131       return data[i1][axis] < data[i2][axis];
00132     }
00133   };
00134 
00135   // --- Training-related --- //
00136 
00138   static KDNode *build(const Vector<T, D> *data, unsigned int *index, unsigned int n,
00139       KDNode *parent, unsigned int bucket_size, unsigned int &processed);
00140 
00142   unsigned int split(unsigned int *index, unsigned int n, const AxisComparer &comparer);
00143 
00144   // --- Search-related --- //
00145 
00147   template <typename C> void explore(const KDNode<T, D> *parent, KDSearchData<T, D> &data, C &candidates) const;
00148 
00150   template <typename C> void intersect(const KDNode<T, D> *parent, KDSearchData<T, D> &data, C &candidates) const;
00151 
00152   // --- IO-related --- //
00153 
00155   bool write_to_binary_stream(std::ostream &out);
00156 };
00157 
00159 template <typename T, const unsigned int D>
00160 class KDIncremental {
00161 public:
00163   KDIncremental(const KDNode<T, D> *node, const KDNode<T, D> *parent, KDSearchData<T, D> &data);
00164 
00166   ~KDIncremental();
00167 
00168 protected:
00169   KDSearchData<T, D> &search_data; 
00170   unsigned int parent_axis; 
00171 
00172   bool modified; 
00173   T previous_axis_nearest; 
00174   T previous_hyperrect_distance; 
00175 };
